channel.title: How to encrypt (makes so you need a pass)?
channel.description: How do I encrypt my source so that if I give to someone to host they can only run server and not be able to copy the source ect?

item.title: How to encrypt (makes so you need a pass)?
item.dc:creator: @Haxor62 Haxor62
item.source: How to encrypt (makes so you need a pass)?

item.title: How to encrypt (makes so you need a pass)?
item.dc:creator: @defyboy defyboy
item.description:
@defyboy wrote:

You cant really encrypt it like that, Java is compiled into an intermediate language called java bytecode. It can be decompiled back into readable java. This is how we manage to get the source code to the Runescape game.

Your best bet is by using a method called Obfuscation, Which will make it hard to reverse engineer the bytecode. Look on google for “java obfuscator”

Read full topic
item.source: How to encrypt (makes so you need a pass)?
